headline: Johnson Controls Announces $9 Billion Increase to Share Repurchase Program
summary: The board of directors of Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE: JCI), the global leader in smart, healthy and sustainable buildings, has approved a $9 billion share repurchase authorization, adding to the $1.1 billion remaining as of the end of the second fiscal quarter under the share repurchase authorization previously approved in 2021.
